commits.author: Yonik Seeley
commits.sourceNew: public void write(Writer writer, SolrQueryRequest request, SolrQueryResponse response) throws IOException;

commits.author: Chris M. Hostetter
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Write a SolrQueryResponse, this method must be thread save. * *

* Information about the request (in particular: formating options) may be * obtained from req but the dominant source of information * should be rsp. *

* There are no mandatory actions that write must perform. * An empty write implementation would fulfill * all interface obligations. *

*/ public void write(Writer writer, SolrQueryRequest request, SolrQueryResponse response) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: public void write(Writer writer, SolrQueryRequest request, SolrQueryResponse response) throws IOException;
